website_summaries.verdict: Elegant design and control bucks the trend of the typical thermostat look. Adds an accent of flair in the room while remaining functional.
pros: Excellent app integration allows you to control the temperature straight from your phone
Interface is easy to see and use
cons: Reliability is questionable in the event of a power failure

website_summaries.verdict: No other Wi-Fi thermostat available today offers this many smart home partnerships for this low of a price, but you should weigh the importance of the integrations against the MSRP -- many 7-day app-enabled programmable thermostats cost just $100.
pros: A responsive touchscreen and integrations with Amazon Alexa, Apple HomeKit, Samsung SmartThings, Wink and IFTTT give the lower-priced $169 Ecobee3 Lite Smart Thermostat serious appeal
cons: Smart" is a bit of a stretch for the Ecobee3 Lite, since it doesn't rely on activity-tracking sensors or any other sort of adaptive tech to learn your routine
$169 is still a lot to spend, especially on a programmable thermostat

customer_reviews.title: Great smart thermostat with the exception with the geofence feature
customer_reviews.text: Great smart thermostat with the exception with the geofence feature. This feature works with your cell phone which senses when you leave home to turn down your thermostat and turns it back on when you return but it only works with one cell phone. Its a problem that one cell phone leaves the premise but there's still people on the premise and the thermostat turns down.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: 2000 miles from home & it is offline, are my pipes frozen?!
customer_reviews.text: We travel during winter so I thought this thermostat would allow us to monitor our house while we’re away. Installed it in September, left in January, middle of February the thermostat went “offline”, I’m 2000 miles from home and hoping that my furnace is still working - but who knows? Ecobee support says they don’t know, in fact they don’t seem to know anything. They think I should turn it off and turn it back on again, but my arms are not long enough for that. All my other home automation is on line and working. I GUESS YOU ROLL THE DICE WHEN YOU INSTALL AN ECOBEE. It will be replaced when I get home!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Love being able to control from my phone
customer_reviews.text: I installed it myself last night while my husband and kids were out of the house. Took me about an hour and half, including one call to tech support to help me hook up the c wire. Seems to be working well and efficient. Love being able to control from my phone. Next to add sensors upstairs and downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn C

customer_reviews.title: just NOT reliable
customer_reviews.text: In the 5 weeks I've had it, the ecobee3 lite has frozen and crashed and rebooted itself 3 times. In contrast, the honeywell wifi model I had previously installed (same wiring, same furnace) worked flawlessly for about a year. Each time, it happened when I tried to use the screen, for example to manually bump up the temp a few degrees. And the super annoying aspect is that then it goes into some sort of calibration mode where the room temp reads like 10 degrees too high for about 10 minutes, meaning you cannot bump up the temp until it is done resettings/recalibrating itself.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great smart thermostat. Nice design and interface and great support.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice device. Attractive, well designed, responsive. I didn't get the option with the sensor because I didn't need it, but it seems would be nice if you had uneven heating/cooling issues. I had a little trouble installing it. I called their support and expected to get the usual run around. They did say high volume of calls but to leave my number and they will call back. I was expecting to have to call their support back. But they called me back within 5 minutes. They then helped me through my install issue, sent me follow up emails, and made sure it was working. I was truly impressed by the device and their customer support. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Milind

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because ecobee was recommended by my ac company. I just replaced my ac unit and the company provided me with a free nest but I ultimately had them install the ecobee which I bought myself at an extra expense. I like the controls on the nest better but feel that the evcbee is more reliable. Ecobee is still easy to use and works great. I also like how thbe current temp is always displayed...with the nest i bever knew what the temperature actually was. Looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works on old Millivolt House Furnace
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old Nest thermostat when it lost support of my several hubs. It worked perfectly on my millivolt furnace. Changing to Ecobee was a simple matter of moving the colored wires to the new device. The secret in both cases is to supply a 24v power supply to the thermostat. No converters or supplemental wiring is needed. The downside of this is that when the House AC power fails, so does the thermostat. It's not a problem for me because my generator kicks in automatically in a power failure and that restores the thermostat power. The Ecobee Lite was definitely a step up because of it's remote room temperature/occupancy sensors and beautiful always on temperature display.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Kinney

customer_reviews.title: It just works
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of Echo's in the house so this is perfect especially since I have to buy sensors anyway. This model is a good price especially living in MA, you can get a rebate to $100. Of course I happen to have only 4 wires and had to install the controller to the central HVAC unit which may be challenging if you are installing it yourself. Otherwise replacing the existing temperature controller was pretty simple and it works so much better than what I had previously. Wish though the app would allow me to set the fan to turn on at certain intervals for ar circulation ONLY when the AC is turned on...
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: DUDE...
customer_reviews.text: wasnt expecting much. But I was surprised. The install was pretty simple, tech support helped, and I got it working with in 20 mins. My bill has dropped about $50 a month. It really helped with the deep customization for your HVAC unit. It does take some testing/tweaking to get your best configs for your home. You will get your moneys worth! Plus it has some data on the site to show whats going on with your system, which is really nice! I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: DMXCrackHeadMind

customer_reviews.title: way too restricted with the new eco+ time for new thermostats
customer_reviews.text: they just updated the thermostat, we spend a few hours in the pool to find both ecobees have let the temperature increase to 81 degrees, really when did i agree to this crap. there are features like time of use and feels like but you have to turn eco+ on, so they are useless spent 2 years waiting for this black box implementation that shows you nothing of what it can do - absolutely horrible update deserving of less than 1 star, wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: E1D1

customer_reviews.title: Product is great but App/Web control is not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Over the past couple of months, I have noticed many times that the app and website are not able to control the thermostats anymore, even when you are home. Outages are becoming the norm, not the exception. Take a look at their status page to see for yourself. The latest fiasco is all of your historical data has many many time gaps giving users data that is 100% garbage. I love the product and the room sensors but the latest issues I've been running into with their control software is just too much.
customer_reviews.author: ScrappyDog22

customer_reviews.title: Check for a C Wire!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend that prior to purchase, you check comparability. If your current thermostat has a C wire, you’re all set to install yourself. However if it does not, and you’re not particularly handy, I would highly recommend adding professional installation. One way to know if your current thermostat has a C wire is to check if it uses batteries. If so, it does not have a C wire. I’m not super handy myself and the wires provided with the PEK were not long enough. I will end up having an electrician install this for me for those reasons.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyLauren101

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay connected to Xfinity Wifi network with Pods
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay connected to Xfinity Wifi network with Pods. You can get it to connect, but the connection constantly drops. To get it to reset you have to touch the thermostat, there is no way to get it to reconnect automatically or to get it to reconnect without physically being present (if you aren't home, you can't reset it from a remote location). Also, it does not show you any current run-time data. You can get prior month history once the thermostat has been in use for 30 days but you can't get your current run time results. Makes it impossible to diagnose current AC issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Arthur

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t know how bad I needed this
customer_reviews.text: I don’t see energy savings, but I don’t care. This thing is awesome. The ability to adjust the temp by the room we are in, using our phones has us spoiled. We no doubt use the heater and AC more than we used to. It switches from heat to cool automatically, so we are always within a 5 degree range. Make sure to get the room sensors with it. They are important, and work well. Bonus: my electric company gave me a $75 rebate for buying this. Score!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: I love my ecobee3 lite
customer_reviews.text: I love my ecobee3 lite. It's very easy to use. I have set it and forgotten it and you can't ask more of that from a thermostat. That's the whole point. It works very well with Apple's homekit which allows for geofencing operations if required. I can't say enough good about the support I got trying to install it. The support team was very knowledgable when they helped me with my air handler that had no terminal blocks. I took pictures of the wiring at the old thermostat and the air handler and they quickly gave me instructions on how to hook it up. I can't remember having more competent support for any product that I've every asked about.
customer_reviews.author: William Lueg

customer_reviews.title: Awful support
customer_reviews.text: I wish i had paid more attention to the reviews about the awful support. My device is also having temperature reading issues as well as sporadic network connection issues. I contacted support today and was. appalled by the terrible rep. She spent half an hour dismissing my issues and talking down to me with unhelpful comments. As far as EcoBee is concerned, their product cannot possibly have any malfunctions. Anything that goes wrong MUST be the customer's fault. Bottom line- EcoBee does NOT honor their warranty and will NOT support malfunctions. Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: First Ecobee
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Nest thermostat at my VRBO property but switched to this ecobee which was compatible with my heat pump system. I feel like it has been very reliable and a little easier to maintain the temperatures I want. Easy set up with a qualified Hvac contractor and so far- I give it an A+ Display is clear and intuitive and the app is user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelene M. Krueger

customer_reviews.title: I like it better than the Emerson I had prior to that.
customer_reviews.text: I had an old style two wire Honeywell prior to purchasing this. Tech-support was very helpful in getting it installed properly. I installed a separate power supply, purchased here on Amazon simply look up power supply for ecobee and it will come up. I like the app and it’s integration with my Apple HomeKit. It also shows the local weather right on the thermostat. So when I look up I can see the outside temperature the inside temperature as well as showing the set temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Di Di

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a good thermostat, Pins de-soldered from board during installation.
customer_reviews.text: During installation put the unit in to test it out and since didn't turn on when i removed it, all pins on left side de-soldered!!!! and they all stuck on the holes on the backplate where cables goes. how all the pins desolder from the board blows my mind. other thermostats i have used never had this issue. to make it work since it was a good price, had to lift plastic section that hold the cables and put some piece of small cardboard for the pins to make contact back with the board. uuugghhh bad bad quality or maybe bad luck.
customer_reviews.author: Sigfredo Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Ease of operation with the app and Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermostat. Installed it in ten minutes. The installation would have been a little longer if I had to use the included connector which allows for installation without a C wire. I cannot express the ease of control with the Ecobee app. AND it works great with Alexa. I set the settings to auto for both heat and cooling. We set the thermostat up with the Alexa app and now all we have to do is ask Alexa to set the thermostat temp to whatever, and bang. If its to warm we ask Alexa for a lower temp. If it’s to cold we ask Alexa for a higher temp. Very nice thermostat by Ecobee.i ordered two more.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were great and the video was so helpful! We had to install the c-wire adjustment and it was a little difficult due to the fact we had more wires than pictured, but my husband figured it out. Would not have been able to do it without the video as well as booklet. Appreciated that the c-wire adjuster came with it. Once installed, it nearly sets up itself. You just answer a few questions. Bingo! It works! We used our Alexa app to give it a name and add it to our devices.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: much better than Nest
customer_reviews.text: The Ecobee is miles ahead of the Nest in terms of speed, compatibility and usability. Nest used to be good before Google bought them out, now its terrible with constant disconnects and software issues. Google removing the Nest Apple Watch app was the last straw. Bought the Ecobee as a replacement and I should have done it sooner! The Ecobee is much faster, always connects and has a much better interface. It has an Apple Watch app also so I can control the temp easily while sleeping. We couldn't be happier with the upgrade! By far the best smart thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Tom A.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, easy install, decent app control.
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install and set up. I appreciated the face plate to cover the damage from the previous thermostat--great idea. The app is easy, but could be a little more intuitive--have to hunt for some settings. One thing that is really needed is a way to schedule the fan by itself. I would like it to cycle during the day, but not night. That doesn't appear to be an option and user forums have been asking for that feature for awhile. An option to ship with some 18/5 wire would be good too. Great to see the c-wire adapter, though didn't need it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil H.

customer_reviews.title: Best smart thermostat on the market...
customer_reviews.text: Do your research and you'll find the Ecobee is the best thermostat around (sorry nest). Ease of installation , feature set, use interface, all amazing, but what really sets it apart is the additional sensors you can add. Why is that important, well if might be 71 degrees in the hallway or where ever you have your thermostat installed but what about the temp in your bedroom while your trying to sleep??? 76 degrees there, but no cooling since it 71 in the hallway. Well add an ecobee sensor to your bedroom and now it's 71 in your bedroom too! and headed for an nice nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: viperamd64

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I have installed a nest thermostat at old house without issue. Followed directions and this would only blow hot air, called customer service and they were suggesting to call HVAC tech. Returned these and put the generic builder thermostat back on the wall, no app connection or WiFi but At least the AC works. Would have kept with better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic support, easily connected
customer_reviews.text: Concerned about C wire, ordered 24 volt transformer, found C connection at furnace, simply ran extra wire from there to thermostat...no need for transformer. Easy installation, works great, Alexa connected, receives weather, simple to set schedule, app shows temp when away, graphs usage, etc. Needed to contact support for programming question, received immediate answer several times contacted. Excellent support (thanks Zak). Could not be happier. Previously returned Google's Nest due to questionable support for Alexa. Ecobee supports Alexa and others without reservations.
customer_reviews.author: MKS

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as advertised.  We're the R&D guinea pigs.
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, this looks like a straight-forward, clean product. There are several program errors that make the furnace run away with itself as it tries to hit the upcoming 'comfort' setting. I still find myself manually turning the heat off at night because for some reason it wants to overshoot the desired temp by 3 or 4 degrees. 3 or 4 degrees doesn't sound like much, but since the remote temp sensors participating are slow to register room temp, the real temp in the room is 10 degrees too hot. Not good for twin 2-yr olds. Get a Honeywell or some other brand with HVAC history.
customer_reviews.author: NiceDay247

customer_reviews.title: The Ecobee3 Lite  may need a software update to work properly in Fan Only mode
customer_reviews.text: The ecobee3 Lite we installed did not work properly in Fan Only mode (with no heat or AC turned on). I spent 45 minutes working with Ecobee technical support (who were very good) troubleshooting the problem. After confirming the problem was real, Ecobee support wanted to try sending the thermostat a software update. After 10-12 minutes waiting for the software to install and the thermostat to reboot, it was determined that the unit worked properly. My question is how many units are being shipped without the necessary software update, causing issues for homeowners?
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hahn

customer_reviews.title: This thing just plain works. Period.
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. We installed it a year ago and we absolutely love it. It has only had an issue once, we rebooted it and it resolved itself. The installation was an absolute breeze although we used a buddy of ours who is an electrician, we really didn't need to do that. One of the beauties of the eco bee is that it doesn't need batteries to operate, it is powered off the cables that are already there. The other great feature is the automatic setting where you give it a range of temperatures and it will automatically start up the A/C or heater. I'm about to order another one for our upstairs thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Upstairs Ecobee
customer_reviews.text: I very much like this thermostat, with the assistance of Ecobee support I was able to install the device and replace my existing unit. I set the unit up with the usual parameters and continue to review the instructions and the refine my settings. For a while I had a bit of a short cycle issue that after reviewing the Ecobee Support information was able to fix with out too much trouble. I love the ability to trend the data that is captured by the unit. I'm sure this Smart Thermostat will save us some money in the future.
customer_reviews.author: John N Heale

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, Awesome for Temp Changes
customer_reviews.text: This device was very simple to setup, with great instructions in actual English - amazing, I know. I quickly got the device connected to my home network and controlled through my iphone. It is nice to easily see and configure temperature values anytime, anywhere. If device loses network, it continues with its normal stuff, there is never a loss of functionality with the temperature in my house. If going on vacation, I set a start and end date, so my electricity is conserved and the house temp goes back to normal just before I get home. A wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: sir frinkfree

customer_reviews.title: Very nice upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: My Son got an ecobee4 when he had a new AC unit installed on his house. He loves it. Now he can control his house temperature from his iPhone. I got an ecobee3. It was easy to install. It's nice being able to control my house temperature from my iPhone. It tracks your temperature habits and hopefully will be saving me money. I wish I would have got ecobee3 sooner. No more coming home to a hot house, as I can control it from my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene T Miller

customer_reviews.title: NIce product, Alexa commands a little confusing, Home Assistant integration spotty
customer_reviews.text: Installation is fairly straight-forward with surprisingly easy-to-read instructions for the layman, even those who don't have a ton of electrical experience. Even after adding the device to Alexa, there is some confusion with how to get Alexa to issue commands to change the thermostat when it is on a schedule; Alexa prevents adjusting the temperature when there is a schedule, even though you would expect your command to change the temperature to take precedence over any other setting. As a Home Assistant user, initial integration was good, but continued functionality has been spotty and I am continuing to understand the difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good - can certainly be better
customer_reviews.text: The install instructions are quite clear. The online resources are extensive. Though it has been just a few weeks of basic thermostat use, my experience so far has been good. What I like is the web portal that has detailed information and graphs - they are not updated too frequently and you need lots of clicking to get anything done. Downloading the information (if you want to analyze your usage on your own) could certainly be made better. The humidity data is faulty. email support is quite slow to respond and not the most helpful. Maybe telephone might be better.
customer_reviews.author: Its A Spade

customer_reviews.title: Best Thermostat on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these in different homes. Control all from one app on my phone. The remote sensors help balance the heat/cooling in your house. There are a dozen different settings you can use to tune the thermostat to your house. Best feature is it can control a steam generator to keep the humidity up in the winter. If humidity falls below set point, it turns on just the steam generator and the furnace blower to distribute steam around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I am not at all happy with the product. Really thought that this would even out the temperature in the house especially the cold spots of my home but that hasn’t been true. I haven’t noticed any difference in the air circulating more evenly. The sensors don’t seem to be effective at all because the colder parts of the house are still chilly- it’s almost like the sensor is not picking up the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Love this thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermostat. It was extremely easy to install. Like a lot of people my older home didn’t have a c wire so I was nervous about messing around in my furnace. The instructions were super clear and easy and I installed it without a hitch. Now I can be even more lazy by yelling at Alexa to turn the heat up. Also look up rebates from your electric company. I received $125 back for installing a energy efficiency thermostat. I recommend looking into a wall plate or you can just redo your wall. I couldn’t find a black wall plate so I purchased a white one and painted it black myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: ‘Support’ lol
customer_reviews.text: Let me first start by saying that this review is less about this model then about the ecobee4. I intended the new ecobee4 to replace my older ecobee ( which works wonderfully but would be utilized to control a new heating zone in the house). The wiring is nearly identical and should have been a seamless switch. NO. Apparently they made significant design changes hat would have required me to change wiring in my air handler to compensate. The unit is inaccessible. The ‘support’ guy couldn’t care less. Very frustrating as I essentially like the product and this would have been my third ecobee in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G

customer_reviews.title: Could not get it to work . . .
customer_reviews.text: My husband spent 6 hours trying to get this installed and up and running. After zero luck, we called and paid for a professional HVAC company to come out and install it for us. They, too, could not get it to work. After calling tech support, they deduced that the unit itself was bad. I went to Lowes and bought another one and it did not work either!! Sorely disappointed in this item and it ended up costing us way more since we had to pay the HVAC company $135 for their efforts to get it to work!
customer_reviews.author: Julz64

customer_reviews.title: Reliable operation and nice user interface
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple as I replaced another brand z-wave thermostat that wasn't reliable. So I already had the common wire. Need a common wire or 5 wires for this type of thermostat. Adding the common wire can be done, but it may not be easy unless you're handy with wiring and controls. Once installed it easily connects to wifi and the app on my phone, ipad, and PC. It has a lot of features so it takes a little getting used to everything it can do. But it is reliable. Connection has never failed after several months of use and several long trips making operation over the Internet essential for me.
customer_reviews.author: K. Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed so far-$30 rebate from power company a plus also
customer_reviews.text: Recently got Alexa Echo which is what triggered the purchase. I had a Filtrete WIFI thermostat for years but No Aleaxa support. Install was a breeze as I had the C wire. So far it has performed flawlessly. I lke the outside local weather at the touch of a icon. I originally tried a Honeywell but it did not have swing adjust which is a must in Arizona. App is much nicer that most. The thermostat is nice to look at. It wakes up when it senses movement. Not using the sensors as my house is small. Lots of tweaks in the settings. Highly recomended!
customer_reviews.author: S. Forcier

customer_reviews.title: Works great for our home!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple install even if needing to use PEK adapter. I am extremely happy with the device! It has a minimum fan run timer per hour, so when the temp gets stagnent the fan can run for X mins per hour, to keep warmer / cooler rooms more balanced. Temp swing thresholds & min. run time seperated for cooling and heating. Easy setup, pin code option to prevent adjustments by the kids or employees, etc. Adjust setting via website, Android and Apple apps and at the device of course. I'm handy & techno friendly, but have no association with ecobee directly or indirectly, and wasn't compensated in any way for this review.
customer_reviews.author: E-Man

customer_reviews.title: Get it, it’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a breeze to install, very easy to set up, and is working perfectly. It sure what everyone is complaining about, and I could have used the C wire adapter but decided to hook up a C wire instead. The weather app is a nice bonus once product is registered, and the app works flawlessly and seems to be the same as the unit display screen. Can’t wait to get the remote sensors and put this beauty to work!
customer_reviews.author: corey boone

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Got this to go along with my new HVAC system in March 2018. The contractor said ecobees are very popular and he has installed dozens. After 5 months of use, not a single complaint. The app is super convenient when away for longer than expected or during vacation, or if you wanna be super lazy and adjust the temp from bed. My neighbor has the ecobee 4 with the remote sensor (in a tri-level home), but having only a single floor ranch myself, I don't think the sensor would provide much added benefit. I've mostly left it set between 66 and 73 and it stays comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marksimus Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work properly on mesh networks
customer_reviews.text: Here is a copy of Ecobee’s tech support; Me; My Ecobee3 doesn’t rejoin after a power outage. My Ecobee4 does, just not the (3). What can be done to resolve this? This is my summer home and I cannot have this issue when I’m away for the winter. ecobee Support (ecobee Support) Jul 4, 3:10 PM EDT Hello Dan, Ecobee does not support mesh network configuration. I understand it works fine with the ecobee 4 but there are no steps I can suggest to have it reconnect automatically with ecobee 3 as well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this smart stat because the Emerson Sensi smart stat i purchased 6-months ago failed to work properly and i was unable to get support from the manufacturer. So, I sent the Sensi back, got a full credit and installed this Ecobee. Wow! So simple. The installation and programming was a breeze. Much easier than the Sensi. This Ecobee also integrates with Alexa much better than the Sensi. Looks great on the wall! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: JolietHomeBrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Support. Flexible features and thresholds.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it myself with terrific customer support along the way from wiring to setting defaults. I have a geothermal system with Aux heat back-up. So far it has worked very well and is stable with my Wi-fi. It is advisable to use their Customer technical support as needed for any wiring, installation start-up and connection to the Wi-fi if any is needed. Could not be any better pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and helps keep the temperature regulated throughout the house with the remote sensors
customer_reviews.text: Support was excellent. I wired the Ecobee in accordance with the model HVAC I had and using the previous hookup for my old thermostat. When the thermostat didn't work, I called tech support and they walked me through the entire process. It turns out my HVAC was wired differently and the wiring didn't correspond to the Ecobee directions. I've been using the system for over three months now and couldn't be happier with its functioning. The ability to remotely control the Ecobee is also a big plus. While travelling, we were able to take the system off the vacation mode and have the house cooled by the time we arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Cody71

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love my EcoBee
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. VERY easy to install if you have even the most basic mechanical abilities. Very easy setup process and the app is very intuitive. It's nice to be able to adjust the thermostat from your phone when you're laying in bed or sitting on the couch. Plus the ability to turn on vacation mode when away from home is very convenient. I find this product to be more aesthetically pleasing than it's competitors as well. If you're after a next-gen thermostat, I don't think you can go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to setup unless you know HVAC systems
customer_reviews.text: The instructions this comes with are very simple, too simple. It took a while for me to figure out the wiring because none of the example diagrams matched my system. I was about to return it, but called tech support (reluctantly, because of pass expreiences with other products). Fortunately, their support was amazing! They were very knowledgeable and patient and got me up and running without too much frustration. When setup correctly, the ecobee works great. Integration with Alexa is simple and consistent. Please note, if you don't have much experience with HVAC systems, call tech support or have a pro help you.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnette Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible with my HVAC system
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. My friend has it and loves it. Unfortunately, I had to return it because it was not compatible with my heating system. It does come with a power extender that will help with many systems that don't have a power wire at the thermostat but you will need to be comfortable installing it in your HVAC system. I highly recommend that you visit their website first in order to determine if your system is compatible. If it is, you should feel comfortable that this is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ewiz

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty with wiring
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instruction 100% as noted for the furnace/AC unit using the PEK and at the thermostat. Everything wired correctly, but the fan would never kick on. I called an AC tech to come and see what I did wrong. His comments were that I wired it exactly as stated, but the common wire wasn't providing enough voltage to run the fan. He re-wired both sides and now it works flawlessly. This device would've received a five star rating if the wiring instructions actually worked as they should've. The device itself is pretty cool, especially paired with the remote sensors. I'll be buying another for our upstairs unit, but will have someone else wire it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great features improving with great support
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort settings, and scheduling. It is far from perfect, but also far easier to use than Nest. Scheduling really needs to be tied to a Google calendar. Another great feature is the Home IQ which offers you see and furnish historical data. This has enabled me to diagnose many problems. I would not go without it. It is a must have. I have called tech support several times, and have always find them working hard to be helpful and to listen.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dan

customer_reviews.title: Well made, simple install, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Took me less than 15 mins to install. Super simple to set up and integrate with home automation systems. Does everything it promises, and can even handle things if you don’t have a c-wire—although it does require some more steps. I have two of these and they work flawlessly. I’d give it 5 stars if HomeIQ could adjust settings according to your use....so yes, make it a smart/learning thermostat...even if the “smarts” live in the cloud and only pushes to your ecobee3 new settings based off that analysis. Overall: Ecobee3 Lite is easy to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Thermostat for the money, very Informative and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best parts of my Smart Home. I've used a cheaper smart thermostat for awhile, and then I switched everything to Wink and my old one didn't support Wink, so I went looking for one that did and found this. I love how it shows on a graph when the zone called for heat and how long, and what the outdoor temp is, and what the thermostat was set at. Very good product, easy to install, easy to follow instructions, and so far the easiest thing I've taught my wife to use. I also like how Ecobee has a Windows 10 App, Xbox App, Android App, Apple Store App... just a great device.
customer_reviews.author: BMarshall

customer_reviews.title: They need to work on their servers and connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: The ecobee is better than the nest as far as options and configuration. But the ecobee does not stay connected and they are slow about updating reports, they may be weeks behind. Maybe I should go back to a Nest... They have a good product, but needs some work on their service. I am afraid that I have bought something that may not be supported much longer. I really do hope they get their game together.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for - creates a temperature band to ensure the house never gets hotter or colder than my set range, without having to flip my previous thermostat back and forth, while reducing the number of runs my HVAC performs in a given day. Highly recommend you purchase a sensor pack (pack of 2) to place at least in bedroom, and in your most populated area, so you can prioritize those (prioritize bedroom at night, ignore other readings). No need for the alexa integration as there's no microphone handoff & the echo dots are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Walker

customer_reviews.title: Smart homes are the future
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for over a year in an apartment. This is x1000 better than the traditional dial thermostat my unit had. Installing was just a little tricky getting power to the thermostat location, but handy friend figured it out for me. Love that it integrates with Alex and Siri. Can set schedules, alerts, etc. So worth the price. I imagine you could buy a used one on ebay for cheap that would work just fine. Collects fingerprints (but you can easily wipe off with paper towel and water). Looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: ayoa2

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal device. Excellent package
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal device. Looks great on the wall. Easy to install. Came with power adapter and excellent instructions. The eco+ and smart features get better all the time. I bought two more of the sensors and have all our most common rooms covered. Overall this system is amazing. Especially since you don't have to worry about Google gobbling up even more of your personal data.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse F

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: While installing the connector on the back broke. I contacted Ecobee which has great customer service, and they told be to just get a exchange through Amazon. Amazingly, Amazon had a new thermostat at my door 2 days later. They gave me a label and handle shipping for the return item. My Samsung smartthing found the ecobee, and integrated it with Alexa. Was also able to use my tablet that was integrated with actiontiles, so I am able to control my unit from tablet mounted on wall, my phone, through Alexa, and at the unit itself. I am very happy with this product, and the customer service of both amazon and ecobee.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan kemper

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so EXCITED to install the Ecobee as soon as it arrived. So proud of myself. I installed the device with their easy step-to-step instruction booklet that was provided. Came with stickers for me to label the wires. It took me 10mins to install and less than 5mins to register my account and linked to my app. Now I can control the temperature from my phone when I'm in bed or out of town. I HIGHLY recommend buying the Ecobee thermostat. It's as good as the Nest but more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have the ecobee thermostat for about one year and it has worked perfectly for my home so I got one for my father house too. It works great for places like mine with major temperature differences between different rooms in the house . I bought a couple of additional sensors too and these take the temperature on the occupied rooms and ensure the average temperature is aligned with your comfort settings. The thermostat was very easy to install and it is very easy to use from the app or the thermostat itself. It is a great product and have help me to save hundred$$$ in energy!
customer_reviews.author: P. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: 3 Wires only controls heat
customer_reviews.text: Living in an older house I only had 3 wires to play with. My current thermostat controls both heating and Central Air. Unfortunately the power extender can only be used with a heating system so I ended up having to upgrade the wiring. With the 5 wires it's a breeze to install and setup. Kudos to Ecobee Tech support who spent a fair bit of time trying to figure out how my existing 3 wires controlled both heating and ac and eventually coming to the conclusion the current wiring configuration wouldn't work with the ecobee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Erratically malfunctions... Complex to use
customer_reviews.text: After having this for 1 year, I have to say it frustratingly mostly works, but sometimes it just stops operating correctly. Sometimes the heater doesn't turn on the heat, or the aircon doesn't turn on the aircon. Some of the settings are complex and remain a mystery to me even today. ( day, night, home, away, vacation, mtwtfss schedules) And I'm a tech geek. Tech support is friendly, but even they are bewildered by some of the problems I've encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Dmh529

customer_reviews.title: Nice T-sat with app control
customer_reviews.text: Good hvac control Only problem is it has dropped internet connection or cloud interface down and then cannot use app but must physically go to controller to make any changes. One unit died about a months after installation. Sent new unit for free but was about 5 days without thermostat. One sensor also died within 2 months and was replaced. Hope these were just defective and that others will last for many many years.
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: Temperature Adjustment
customer_reviews.text: The Ecobee thermostat is very accurate in maintaining the temperature as long as the schedules and comfort settings are created. Also after a while the energy usage gets displayed as a report which really helps. I have reduced my monthly energy consumption by at least 30% after putting in Ecobee.
customer_reviews.author: Supratim De

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thermostat and is supported by an awesome tech staff. I was wiring it up and needed a little help so I called their support. After sending a couple of pictures the tech gave me the correct method and I completed the instillation. It is easy to program and has great videos to help do that. I am totally satisfied with the Ecobee and its support team.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Simply Cool!
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t have one, get one! Especially like the remote room sensors. Bought 2 thermostats: one for the upstairs system, one for the down stairs system. One system didn’t have the C wire out the supplied PEK did the trick! The iPhone Ap is working great and the set by step installation instructions with videos were great. Take your time, and follow their instructions. You will love the end result..
customer_reviews.author: NJF

customer_reviews.title: bought for new house
customer_reviews.text: I had this in my old house so when we moved we just had to order another. It really helps us keep energy costs under control and being able to adjust the temp when not at home has been so helpful especially since we have pets in the house. If temps get to a certain level high or low we get an alert. Love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the ecobee3 lite and installed it. Nothing happened. I spent two hours wiggling wires and trying to figure out where I went wrong. It's summer in Kentucky, so it was hot and getting hotter. I called an HVAC tech yesterday to get a professional to help. After a 2-hour service call, we realized the ecobee just doesn't work. He installed a spare thermostat from his truck and my air works great. So, what I thought was a good deal at $99.99 ended up costing $300+ without a smart thermostat. At least I can get a refund for the $99.99!
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good Experience
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the Ecobee thermostat for a few weeks and I love it. Before I leave for my weekend house, I can turn on the air conditioning and have the house at a comfortable temperature by the time I arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Frank P.

customer_reviews.title: It works well and looks decent
customer_reviews.text: I like my ecobee. It does exactly what I want it to and the install was very straight forward. But after seeing it in person next to a nest, the nest just looks a lot cooler. To me, paying $70 less was more important than the design. But if your more interested in it looking cool, go with the nest. They pretty much do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Branson C.

customer_reviews.title: Constant server outages making the product a Stand alone thermostat only
customer_reviews.text: The servers are down more than you could possibly guess! I signed up for server outage emails because it seemed like they were having issues often. To help put things into perspective, I will say that I am considering unsubscribing to the outage emails because I get SO many of them. Pretty miserable to have a wireless big name thermostat with something like multiple outages every other day or more. Get your act together Ecobee. I had the “Radio Thermostat” by 3M for years. I can’t remember any server outages that I noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Good !
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is better than second gen. Sensors work ok but don’t sense occupancy that well. Defect in thermostat one year after purchase was not fixable with replacement. I like the ecobee. I’ve had three. Great idea. This used to blow the nest away but no not so sure. After outranking nest I think you want a nest. Especially after amazon left me hanging after just one year.
customer_reviews.author: Silly

customer_reviews.title: Smart decision
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! Did a lot of research before deciding on this smart thermostat. It is very easy to use. The "Follow Me" feature is the best part. I work from home so when I am in my office, the heater is not keeping the rest of the house warm. Already have seen a significant reduction in my monthly bill. Works perfectly with Alexa. Also, the "Away" feature determines that I've left the house and automatically lowers to the "Away" temperature I have set. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Donatello

customer_reviews.title: "Smart" thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Thermostat works well and the ability to schedule what temp sensor to use is great. The ecobee servers on the other hand are absolute trash. The smart part of this smart thermostat is honestly a joke. At what point does ecobee spend money to fix this issue? The pic is the most recent issue. The gaps in the line are when there are issues. This covers about 7 hours and the issue has been ongoing for days.
customer_reviews.author: BoB

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Easy Integration
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought this was that it integrates with my Indigo / Insteon home automation system. I had trouble getting the Nest thermostat to integrate and the Insteon thermostat is ugly and primitive. The Echobee setup very quickly and looks great in my house. Integration with Indigo and Alexa was a breeze and I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Marc S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great thermostat. Super easy install. The manual walks you through everything. C wire or not. The app and unit both look great. Definitely minimal, could use a few more features. Just having it on a schedule with the IM Home App cut my heating bill in half. Yes in half! Love that I can always check how warm the house is from anywhere and adjust the temp if I know I won’t be home for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 30 minute increments for programs kills it for me.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nicely designed bit of hardware, but the software leaves a lot to be desired. The way you program it is very odd but I could live with that if I could set a start or end time to something other than the hour or half hour. That’s just ridiculously and makes it petty useless - either wake the household up early when the heating starts or get up in the cold; how is that smart? Since Ecobee has been around a long time now I don’t see this changing.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with the iOS app.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed with this product. I installed the thermostat correctly and could not get it to communicate with the iOS app so I could not control the temperature remotely. After emailing with customer support for a week and troubleshooting several different things, their solution was for me to wait until they could "rebuild the iOS app from the ground up" which will likely take several months. After wasting all this time I returned my ecobee and purchased a Nest, which I wish I would have done in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: KD19

customer_reviews.title: Excellent thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I love our ecobee thermostat! We upgraded from an ancient toad of a t-stat, and it has been wonderful. I specifically chose this one because 1) my husband is forgetful and likes to leave the heat up so the ants and spiders are comfy and warm while we are at work, and I am a miser; 2) my daughter’s room is noticeably warmer than any others, so we are able to customize temps. I feel it’s safer, more informative about usage, and it’s pretty. The thermostat is downstairs, and the bedrooms are upstairs, so it’s also nice to adjust with our phones instead of running downstairs in the middle of the night. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: ReAnn

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Have had it in for about a month and I like it a lot. We loved the tech support help. They were able to help us out and it saved us so much unneeded time. We have two of these for downstairs and upstairs and our electric bill wasn't too crazy. Were going to see this month as its a new house and were not sure what it normally is.
customer_reviews.author: jillian.kornick.woodward

customer_reviews.title: Getting a Nest instead
customer_reviews.text: In my previous home I had a 2nd gen Nest thermostat for 6 years, loved it, but left it behind for the new owners. Figured I'd try something new with the Ecobee. What a mistake. The iOS app is clunky and slow, and you have to go deep into setting to do something as simple at turning on the furnace fan. The remote sensors won't stay connected, even tho they are less that 50 feet away. The web interface, iOS app and screen on the ecobee itself are out of sync and show different information. Will be returning this and getting another Nest.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Smart Controller
customer_reviews.text: I finally purchased two of these.. One for upstairs and one for downstairs They work awesome. A little pricey, but quality does come with a price. We highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Allan S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy instal and setup. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very easy to setup. Hasnt dropped the wifi connection that i have noticed unlike my last smart thermostat. Keeps the temperature consistent withou turning on and off over and over for short periods of time. The weather feature is convenient. I also like how it activates when we approach it. Almost like a nightlight in the dark. Setting up the remote room temp sensors is also a breeze. Almost zero effort. Would recommend this to anyone looking for a smart thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Feet

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one of these Ive purchased Easy to install. I bought the black backplate too so I wouldn't have to paint the wall as old thermostat was bigger I had an older furnace in our vacation home and called technical support. They were great and had it up and running in no time App works well too
customer_reviews.author: THall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent "how to" installation that I downloaded to me phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent "how to" installation that I downloaded to me phone so the instructions went with me. Up and running in about 30 minutes - if I had to do it again probably 15 minutes or less. Caution - the unit has a brain. So when you set a temperature, the unit determines just how long it will take to reach that temperature and begins that much before reaching the set point. Just the opposite of my old thermostat that began to bring the temperature up or down when the set time was reached. No biggie but had a couple interesting mornings before I realized what was happening.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great options, great tech support.
customer_reviews.text: Looking to up your thermostat game? At least give this guy a shot. Installation was a challenge for me since my wires didn't match up exactly how it was expecting. Tech support had me send them a photo of my indoor unit and in less than a day they had the answer. It performs great, has plenty of options, and the add-able sensors make it perfect for a house with uneven air flow. The major difference between this and the upgraded version is no Alexa on this device (but you can talk to other Alexa devices to talk to this) and you won't be able to control non-standard units with this version (like humidifiers).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. I wish the guys who wrote this installation ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I wish the guys who wrote this installation manual wrote everything because it is so simple and easy to follow. The thermostat looks amazing and is really cool to use with Alexa. Simple to program for home, away and sleep as well as winter and summer. Sleek and sexy design. I purchased the wall mount after to set up in a few days but it looks great on its own as well. App is also easy to use. Welcome to the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: You’ll never go back
customer_reviews.text: No more fighting over who has to run downstairs to turn the temperature up/down! I almost bought one at Home Depot but realized this one on amazon was $30-$40 cheaper. Works great about a year later and I love that it shows the time and weather outside. Boyfriend installed it and had somewhat of a tough time but had no problem doing it himself without any tech support.
customer_reviews.author: LR8ER

customer_reviews.title: Works really well but app is bad
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat itself is awesome. I've been using it for about three months now. Used to have a nest but the ecobee has way more options/settings. The only really downside is the app. It's SO SLOW and buggy. The website works well but who uses websites anymore when you have an app? EDIT Nov 2018: Still love the thermostat and the app has gotten better. It's still far from great. The android app crashes frequently and different content is shown on android/ios/website which is seriously confusing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this product! I bought 2 (one for the upstairs and 1one for the downstairs) for our vacation home because I wanted to be able to adjust the thermostat remotely. They worked fine for 7 weeks and now the upstairs Ecobee will not stay “online” after we leave so I’m unable to control the thermostat at all. I contacted the company via Amazon but they said they can’t do anything unless I’m at the home to do troubleshooting. But it only does this when I’m not there. Obviously a defective product
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Thermostat!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smart thermostat that didn't need a common wire, and the Ecobee3 was the only one that didn't need one. It also happened to be one of the highest rated smart thermostats, so I decided to buy it. Installation was fairly easy. The only challenging part was attaching the Power Extender to the furnace control board, but that's the part that makes the common wire unnecessary, so it's critical to make the smart thermostat work. Ecobee's directions, both written and video, were excellent, so that helped a lot. The thermostat looks great, and comes with everything needed to make a sharp looking installation. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Lemon product
customer_reviews.text: Barely 8months and this works no more. I have multiple ecobees in the house and this is the only one that loses connection to its paured sensor daily. Now it says "There may be a problem with the Boiler. For the past 4 hours the thermostat has been calling for heat, but the room temperature has decreased by 3.3F."..... but the other ecobees are not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Olumide A.

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing difference this made
customer_reviews.text: Of the 4 different brands of smart thermostats that I've owned, this is the first on that actually keeps the house at a steady comfortable temperature. Once it "learns" your home, it knows how to anticipate heat/cool needs. All hot/cold spots are gone now (the others would heat too high or cool to deep / could not predict patterns). Oh, and that annoying relay "click" is gone when the thermostat turns on.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: love these!
customer_reviews.text: When we built our house, we decided to install these switches. I originally looked at the Nest devices, but was told they tended to have problems so I changed to these. I have been very happy ever since. I had to call tech-support for a glitch. It turns out, it was with my HVAC system and not the switches. The technician was super helpful. The app integrates very easily with the devices. Very easy to use and set up. The instructions make it extremely simple.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine J. Mausolf

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good, took me a few days to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good, took me a few days to get used to how it works specially getting used to the temperature range since my old thermostat was old and was much simpler. But so far I am very happy with it, I noticed that my AC is not on all the time like it used to be and the house temperature is more consistent. Also, the install in my case was pretty easy and completed it in under an hour (i triple check everything) including using there power extender kit (Instructions where very accurate).
customer_reviews.author: Zeus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, sleek and modern smart thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, came with adaptor to connect to an older home heating system, which my house has. Easy to program and use. Pairs with home WiFi and can adjust home heating and cooling settings and programs from the unit or from you phone/tablet with the free to download application. It is nice to be able to turn on/off heating and A/C from the road to save energy and have a comfortable home when you return. Also displays forecast which is handy. Looks sleek and modern. Very happy with the Ecobee smart thermostat!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, simple setup, user friendly everything
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up in to time, don’t let your cable fall through the wall to the basement like I did! Smarthings integration and separate app work great. Extra sensors aren’t worth it for me, works great without them. Love heating up my house an hour before coming home after a long work trip.
customer_reviews.author: Pasha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade to my home thermostat. Easy install. I installed my two (upstairs and downstairs) in about 30 minutes. Easy and user friendly app setup. Connects without issue to WiFi and quick to update when operating remotely.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Billig

product_meta.title: ecobee3 lite Smart Thermostat, 2nd gen
product_meta.description: Style:Thermostat OnlyLive better Save more With its beautiful design easy-to-use touchscreen display and up to 23%* savings on heating and cooling costs* the Ecobee3 lite is the smarter thermostat that helps you live better and save more It also now pairs with room sensors to help manage hot or cold spots in the home delivering comfort to the rooms that matter most And because they track occupancy they make your home even smarter about saving energy when you’re away Ecobee3 lite pairs with up to 32 sensors Works with echo apple home kit Samsung SmartThings wink and fits We want you to love our products as much as we do so your Eco bee comes backed by a 3-year
feature_bullets: SAVE MONEY: Homeowners save up to 23% annually on heating or cooling costs, plus ecobee pays for itself in under 2 years (compared to a hold of 72 degrees)

WORKS WITH ROOM SENSORS: Place them in the rooms that matter the most and have the temperature balanced throughout your whole home. Measuring both occupancy and temperature, sensors signal your ecobee Smart Thermostat to automatically switch to the right mode for comfort when you’re home or for savings when you’re not. 2-pack sold separately.

EASILY INSTALL YOURSELF: It only takes about 30 minutes, thanks to an easy to follow installation guide and an in-app step-by-step walkthrough. Everything you need comes in the box, including a Power Extender Kit for homes with no common wire (C-wire).Power consumption:Less than 3.5 VA

CONTROL FROM ANYWHERE: Easily adjust your thermostat from wherever you are using your iOS (iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch) or Android device. The ecobee mobile app is available in the App Store or on Google Play. Compatibility- Gas, oil, electric, dual fuel, Conventional (2H/2C), Heat Pump (4H/2C)

PLAYS WELL WITH OTHERS: ecobee3 lite works with your favorite smart home setups, including Apple HomeKit, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Microsoft Cortana, Samsung SmartThings, Wink, and IFTTT.Power Source: AC. Contact Manufacture for any assistance - contact in user manual
